communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Scott Raymond Dozier Case
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

INFORMATION REQUEST:
- Incident report
- Arrest report
- Any other report, investigative notes
- Declaration of warrant if applicable

CASE INFORMATION:
Perpetrator name: Scott Raymond Dozier (DOB 11/20/1970)
Incident start date: 08/12/1998
Arrest made: 08/15/1998

Las Vegas Metropolitan Police Department EVENT NUMBER:
LLV - 981029-2037
**This became a federal case. 
**Narcotics Interdiction Team worked this case.

Locations:
- Harry Reid International Airport, Las Vegas, Nevada / Delta Air Cargo
- 4700 Cinderella Lane, Las Vegas, Nevada
- Hawaii International Airport
- Outrigger Ohai Waikiki Hotel, Honolulu, Hawaii

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Gianna Toboni
